referenced_codes.description: Thoracotomy performed in conjunction with spinal procedures by a surgeon not performing the spinal surgery constitutes M137 (P13).
Laparotomy performed in conjunction with spinal procedures by a surgeon not performing the spinal surgery constitutes S312 (S34).
Three-dimensional (3D) computer-assisted stereotactic navigation must include the pre-operative or intra-operative generation of axial, sagittal and coronal reformatted images.
Two-dimensional (2D) computer-assisted stereotactic navigation must include the intra-operative generation of antero-posterior, lateral or multiple oblique 2D views.
Acute spinal cord injury premium is only eligible for payment when rendered to patients who are described under ASIA impairment scale ratings A to C.
